title: First Lady Melania Trump to Host Queen Rania of Jordan – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
April 5, 2017
First Lady Melania Trump, along with her husband President Donald J. Trump, will greet King Abdullah II and Queen Rania of Jordan at the White House.  Following a brief meeting in the Oval Office, the First Lady will host Queen Rania for lunch in the residence.  After lunch, the ladies will visit a local elementary school. A readout of the visit will be provided later in the day.
